title: HeartSeeker Varus
body:
OMG Riot I would like to thank you for making this amazing skin.

Hes like so freaking hot, praise the lord finally a really hot skin for a male champ. Ahhh thank you Riot!!! Im currently begging my friend to learn to play Varus and get that skin so I always have a pretty face and body to look at while play as the support lol.


Eep I'm just super excited!

replies.body:
Hotty with a body. {{champion:110}}

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5jhCXlVCKRI/VMf1BTWPToI/AAAAAAAAifY/xl6kC_Pxvps/s1600/varunlong.jpg
Question:  Have you tried it without the voice effect?  I don't think becoming the "Bishonen Cupid" would make this skin's voice sound like he's a 30-year chain smoker.
Had a similar thought myself. Just checked with the skins team and they're planning on discussing using the non filtered version of his voice (as per Arclight Varus) tomorrow.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=XpIXdBO1,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2015-01-28T05:31:08.391+0000)
>
> Had a similar thought myself. Just checked with the skins team and they're planning on discussing using the non filtered version of his voice (as per Arclight Varus) tomorrow.

Is there any update on this?  I'm not on the PBE so I don't know if it's been changed or tested.

This would be great! What would be nice also is if his homeguard running animation was one like caterpillar kog'maw's, or some sort of flying animation. But I doubt it'll make it since it's so close to his realease date. It would be cool though.

{{champion:44}}  aproves. FABULOUS.

I see a new lane match up that may be terribly distracting...

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5j8Od1Bom5I/VMghBDJCDaI/AAAAAAAAihc/WmwtrAOqSEg/s1600/varusrecal.jpg
Manliest recall I ever seen.

> [{quoted}](name=Silven,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=XpIXdBO1,comment-id=00060003,timestamp=2015-01-28T11:37:18.014+0000)
>
> http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5j8Od1Bom5I/VMghBDJCDaI/AAAAAAAAihc/WmwtrAOqSEg/s1600/varusrecal.jpg
> Manliest recall I ever seen.

I don't know why but I kinda thought of this when I saw his recall...

> [{quoted}](name=Rozuka,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=XpIXdBO1,comment-id=00060002,timestamp=2015-01-28T02:42:47.195+0000)
>
> Can you give me advice on my champion concept?

Rozuka, no offense but you're kind of spamming this everywhere. If you'd like, I'll take a look at it, just tone down the spam please, its a little redundant seeing you say this everywhere a red has posted :/
Pics or it didn't happen. I'm rather skeptical since there's already a Valentine skin coming - Sweetheart Annie.

Annie's was released early as the post on the PBE made it clear. So there was something else coming as well and now it's been revealed as Heartseeker Varus, which is also why when you look at the patch notes (5.2) Annie's skin isn't being released during this patch.

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=XpIXdBO1,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2015-01-27T23:57:20.984+0000)
>
> Annie's was released early as the post on the PBE made it clear. So there was something else coming as well and now it's been revealed as Heartseeker Varus, which is also why when you look at the patch notes (5.2) Annie's skin isn't being released during this patch.

It was so hard to not spill the beans when talking about Annie. xD
Yeah I bet it was, or can be for anything really XD

I thought you should know that when you end an argument with "and you just proved mine more" that shows you are childish like you claim I am. Stop using words to describe me when again, you don't even know me. Thanks, bye.

Sad when you come from one thread and bring issues to another.  You're just too far gone for anyone to help you and that's that. 

Not listening to you anymore thanks.

It's sad that I have to come from one thread into another to try and knock some common sense into you. You made your mind up based on three responses. It is laughable that you know the whole story when clearly you don't.

So are you really not listening to me anymore? The first time you said bye you didn't really leave, so I bet you are listening. Stop being so rude to me.
Just continue bringing yourself down further and further.  You've also been reported for harassment cause that's all this is now.
And you have been reported for harassment. You insist on implying that I am really toxic when I'm clearly not. That is more abusive.
From what I see here you hunted someone down in a thread to complain about a completely different thread. Riot frowns on that so expect some form or suspension/ban.

Then you saw wrong. Read the other thread and you will see why I'm so pissed off. I frown on riot for not having civil discussion with me during any of my support tickets, so I'm not going to be civil with them now.
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/01/127-pbe-update.html
it's on surrender @ 20
Pool party Graves was also supposed to be a "hot guy" skin, but hey, whatever floats your boat.

There needs to be a 5 man "hot guy" skin set.

RIOT TAKE MY BAIT PLZ.
Make them all ADC's though, so you can play the MANLIEST team, 5 adcs.
When you need manly support, you call {{champion:201}}.

Yup, this is the second one
Still, very appreciated, there's plenty of "fanservice-y" skins for female champs, but very few for male champs (especially for those who in their base skin are not already showin pecs) :)

How I feel right now...

(lel idk what I'm doing with my life at this point) (I need help...Maybe.)
I had just made a thread for this a month ago too. Glad they've considered it. Now we need Heartseeker Urgot.

Wha..?  *Googles.*

Oh, god dammit.

*Gets credit card.*
I have Armor Of The Fifth Age {{champion:44}}, lets lane!~

MANY PEOPLE AND MYSELF HAVE BEEN WANTING THIS TO HAPPEN FOR A MILLION YEARS!!!!!! WOOHOOO! RITO UR DA BEST ILY BABY I KNEW YOU WOULD DO IT! \(O u O)/

I want to freaking preorder it now!!! D:<

Varus baby...IM COMING 4 DAT CUPID BOOTY!
OK, I'm sold, if I only owned Varus. I like it, and I pray that next year is Heartseeker Taric. Need me some Man-Candy Taric (he'll have his VU by next Valentine's).
Booty Seeker Varus! I can't wait for the splash art HHHHHHHNNNNNNNNNNNGGGGGGGGGGGG!

something something something something fanservice something something something "unattainable standards for men" something something


I will buy it though, love Varus, love the skin.

Something something oppression

It's a breath of fresh air to see a fanservice-y man in this game considering how many women are made to fill that role (let alone individual skins for those that don't normally)

Heartseeker Varus and classic Braum are gonna make a *manly* bot lane together!
All seriousness, It's cute (I call it the "Bishonen Cupid" for reasons) but the voice needs to not sounds so... Varus-like.  Like, maybe remove the filter/effect?
my friend already mains varus because of me, i know how you feel :D
Varus gets the best skins lol

Now we just have to wait for the Armor of the Fifth Age Taric to be visually uograded :3

Dat Bot Lane will be awesome

Armor of the fifth age Taric sends his regards.

Count your days, you filthy heathen.

Pretty sure a girl made this thread LOL


Either way I find the skin amusing.
Meh the skin is ridiculous just like all other heartseeker skins

Dafuq heartseeker varus!?!?!
thats a new matchup gay skin{{champion:44}} + heartseeker{{champion:110}}  = GAY

ur gey m8 1v1 me n00b

l00ser plays muffle toss with taric
